ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] (unknown)
ygData.msgSnippet: Brother Aedir, That would depend on how heavy the dented brass mask is. If the weight is equal or similar for both items, select the higher AC item. STR at
ygData.messageBody:
Brother Aedir,

That would depend on how heavy the dented brass mask is. If the weight is
equal or similar for both items, select the higher AC item. STR at those
levels adds very little to your average damage output, and it means little
to monks in reference to carrying capacity.

At 02:08 PM 4/21/00 +0000, you wrote:
>Hey guys, but of advice, shoudl I got for a Silver Ruby Veil (4 str,
>4 wis) or should I go for a dented brass mask (Ac 3, 3 str I think)
>Which would serve me better overall do you think?
>
>Aedir Soulstriker
>22nd lvl Monk
><Trinity Pact>
>Sol Ro

In Quellious's Name,

Manjushri Bodhisattva
Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)
